text:
In a non-proxied environment, SVG scaling doesn't work under authoring on in
live. If I remove the ?lenya.module=svg&width=160&height=120, the image does
load at full size. Haven't tested under a proxy. Don't see any errors in the logs.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: It works in my proxy-based setup. I'll try without proxying.
Are you using a non-empty context path?
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> In a non-proxied environment, SVG scaling doesn't work under authoring on in
> live. If I remove the ?lenya.module=svg&width=160&height=120, the image does
> load at full size. Haven't tested under a proxy. Don't see any errors in the
> logs.

I can reproduce the problem with Jetty. It's probably related to this change:

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=551223
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
The problem is that default non-proxy URLs don't include protocol, server name
and server port.
creator: andreas@apache.org
